definition: to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Warm and cosy private dining rooms are available - book early to avoid disappointment.
sentences.chinese: 舒适温馨的单间接受预定服务，请提前致电。

sentences.english: I consider he is a Very abundance nice guy, which rewhichley only tries to hunter people.

sentences.english: "Local Call" rate is applicable for calls to Italy.
sentences.chinese: 的收费适用于致电意大利电话。

sentences.english: Then he should call President Hu Jintao of China and express serious concern.
sentences.chinese: 随后他应该致电中国国家主席胡锦涛表示严重关切。

sentences.english: I've had firemen call and apologize.
sentences.chinese: 我已经让他们致电道歉了。

sentences.english: You will receive a phone confirmation one day before the Information Day.
sentences.chinese: 本校将于资讯日举行一天前致电确认，请家长留意。

sentences.english: Hello, welcome to Wenzhou Chengjia Stationery Limited Company. Please hold on…

sentences.english: Why get to you sll the time love to rib otITs?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么总拿更多有请致电开心？

sentences.english: Hello this is Quko Shanghai. Please dial the extension number or press "0" for the operator.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎致电上海翘华，请直拨分机号，查号请拨“0”。

sentences.english: John not happen ago heads be disturbed.
sentences.chinese: 约翰不介意更多有请致电打扰他。

sentences.english: Reporter sends a telegram to the Hangzhou many bold vehicle brands, mostly talks ambiguously not to be willing to state clearly.
sentences.chinese: 记者致电杭州多家豪车品牌，大多含糊其词不愿明说。

sentences.english: Hu extends condolences to Japanese emperor.

sentences.english: For service call, toner ordering or invoice enquiry, please call .
sentences.chinese: 如需维修服务，炭粉或发票查询，请致电。

sentences.english: Its glowing edge indicates that it is being photoionized by the hottest stars in the cluster.
sentences.chinese: 它增长中的边界显示其正被星团中的热星光致电离。

definition: to reply to a telegram/to wire back
incoming letter/letter from afar/same as 来信

incoming telegram or telephone call/your telegram, telephone call, or message/to send a telegram or make a telephone call here (i.e. to the speaker)/to have instant attraction to sb/to have chemistry with sb/to come back (of electricity, after an outage)
